Description: One side of a bronze mirror-case; raised edges on one side, with concentric ridged decoration - probably cast - on the outside surface; surface of metal heavily corroded.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Curium
Curator's comments: See, M.-J. Chavane, La nécropole d’Amathonte Tombs 110-385. IV. Les petits objets (Nicosia 1990), pp. 14-15 for examples from Amathus.
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p. 85, Tomb 69 no. 5)
